contents: 给Tree指定filter函数，即可实现节点过滤功能，该函数返回false则表示过滤掉该项。你需要给data的每一项添加全局唯一的key否则过滤时，会因为每次更新key不同而闪动

highlighted.content:
import Tree from 'kpc/components/tree';
import Input from 'kpc/components/input';

const data = [
    {
        label: 'First floor-1',
        key: '1',
        children: [
            {
                label: 'Second floor-1.1',
                key: '1-1',
                children: [
                    {
                        label: 'Third floor-1.1.1',
                        key: '1-1-1'
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        label: 'First floor-2',
        key: '2',
        children: [
            {
                label: 'Second floor-2.1',
                key: '2-1',
                children: [
                    {
                        label: 'Third floor-2.1.1',
                        key: '2-1-1' 
                    },
                    {
                        label: 'Third floor-2.1.2',
                        key: '2-1-2'
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                label: 'Second floor-2.2',
                disabled: true,
                key: '2-2',
                children: [
                    {
                        label: 'Third floor-2.2.1',
                        key: '2-2-1'
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
];

<div>
    <Input v-model="keywords" placeholder="Please enter keywords to filter node."/>
    <Tree data={{ data }}
        v-model:expandedKeys="expandedKeys"
        filter={{ self._filter }}
    />
</div>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;

    defaults() {
        return {
            expandedKeys: ['2', '2-1'],
        };
    }

    _filter(data) {
        const {keywords} = this.get();
        if (!keywords) return true;
        return data.label.includes(keywords);
    }
}
